channel.title: Senate on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Senate on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Ousted CDC director to testify before Senate after RFK Jr. called her a liar
item.description: Monarez said she was fired for not pre-approving vaccine recommendations from a dubious panel.

item.title: RFK Jr. says COVID shots still available to all as cancer patients denied access
item.description: RFK Jr. accused senators of making things up as they made factual points on vaccines.

item.title: Former NASA chief says United States likely to lose second lunar space race
item.description: “It is highly unlikely the United States will beat China’s projected timeline.”

item.title: The fight over science funding: Congress vs. the OMB
item.description: The Senate is restoring science funding to normal levels; that may not be enough.
